channel.title: List of All Current Projects
channel.description:
ANY MEMBER CAN ADD OTHER MEMBERS! Direct member requests will not be approved, as no one has time to review individual user profiles.
Guidelines: All posts should be related to software, electronics, and hardware related to ceramics. For discussions of glazes, materials, and studio tools please post to other groups.
EVERYTHING YOU POST IN FACEBOOK WILL BE LOST.
If you are interested in preserving knowledge, post on the Glazy Wiki (https://wiki.glazy.org), instead.
Current Projects:
Pieter Mostert's Lipgloss, a python app for calculating recipes from UMF analyses.
https://github.com/PieterMostert/Lipgloss
Dan Lizotte's Glaze Formulator, a web application built using R for creating recipes from UMF analyses:
https://glaze.warewolves.ca/
Matthew Katz's U.M.F calculator for Excel
http://www.ceramicmaterialsworkshop.com/umf-calculator.html
Tom Demeranville's Currie Grid calculator http://demeranville.com/pottery/curriecalc.html
Jason Bruce's Specific Gravity calculator
https://jbruce12000.github.io/glaze-specific-gravity-calculator/html/specific-gravity.html
The Discourse Wiki on our own secure server.
https://wiki.glazy.org
Ceramics Dictionary
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WVEwkShTHL9KsmFClMqaqJFl63WZ_20fLo2OF80Nw_8/edit?usp=sharing
Glazy version 2
https://glazy.org
https://derekphilipau.github.io/vue-d3-stull-charts/
Ceramic Chemistry Visualization
Various types of web visualizations for ceramics. Includes Javascript Stull Charts.
https://derekphilipau.github.io/ceramic-chemistry-visualization/
Related Projects:
GlazeMaster 3 Downloads (now free, including FileMaker source)
http://www.masteringglazes.com/glazemaster/downloads.html

item.title: List of All Current Projects
item.dc:creator: derek
item.description:
ANY MEMBER CAN ADD OTHER MEMBERS! Direct member requests will not be approved, as no one has time to review individual user profiles.

Guidelines: All posts should be related to software, electronics, and hardware related to ceramics. For discussions of glazes, materials, and studio tools please post to other groups.

EVERYTHING YOU POST IN FACEBOOK WILL BE LOST.

If you are interested in preserving knowledge, post on the Glazy Wiki (https://wiki.glazy.org), instead.

Current Projects:

Pieter Mostert’s Lipgloss, a python app for calculating recipes from UMF analyses.

GitHub

PieterMostert/Lipgloss

Python app for creating glaze recipes. Contribute to PieterMostert/Lipgloss development by creating an account on GitHub.

Dan Lizotte’s Glaze Formulator, a web application built using R for creating recipes from UMF analyses:

https://glaze.warewolves.ca/

Matthew Katz’s U.M.F calculator for Excel

http://www.ceramicmaterialsworkshop.com/umf-calculator.html

Tom Demeranville’s Currie Grid calculator http://demeranville.com/pottery/curriecalc.html

Jason Bruce’s Specific Gravity calculator

https://jbruce12000.github.io/glaze-specific-gravity-calculator/html/specific-gravity.html

The Discourse Wiki on our own secure server.

https://wiki.glazy.org

Ceramics Dictionary

docs.google.com

Ceramics Dictionary

README The Ceramics Dictionary is being locked until Glazy translations are complete. You can help by translating Glazy Materials Here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jhBzdeqwhltQ7l3SkATl6rZkvUDOS3lpZtnw6zGr0uY/edit?usp=sharing And join...

Glazy version 2

https://glazy.org

https://derekphilipau.github.io/vue-d3-stull-charts/

Ceramic Chemistry Visualization

Various types of web visualizations for ceramics. Includes Javascript Stull Charts.

derekphilipau.github.io

Ceramic Chemistry Visualization

Various types of web visualizations for ceramics.

Related Projects:

GlazeMaster 3 Downloads (now free, including FileMaker source)

http://www.masteringglazes.com/glazemaster/downloads.html
